About NAVCODE

NavCode is a student-friendly website made to help beginners start their coding journey with confidence. It works by connecting users to different coding game websites where they can learn programming through fun and interactive challenges. Instead of feeling overwhelmed or not knowing where to begin, students can use NavCode as a guide to explore beginner-friendly coding games that match their interests and skill levels. By learning through games, NavCode makes coding easier to understand, more enjoyable, and less intimidating for new programmers.

Benefits of NavCode for new programmers:

• Makes learning to code fun through game-based websites

• Helps beginners find trusted coding platforms in one place

• Reduces confusion by guiding students on where to start

• Encourages learning at one’s own pace

• Improves problem-solving and logical thinking skills
